title: Team LF Plat (Preferably Diamond) + Top for Open Ladder
body:
Hey there. Our team is currently looking for a top lane for the upcoming tournaments starting tomorrow who are atleast platinum, preferably diamond tier or above, must have Skype. 
Add ESC Trueshot in-game if you're interested.
Hurry! There's not much time left!

replies.body: Added. I'll talk to you soon.
